title: Mortgage and refinance interest rates today, January 9, 2026: Down three-quarters of a point from a year ago
full_text: Mortgage and refinance interest rates today, January 9, 2026: Down three-quarters of a point from a year ago. These are today's mortgage and refinance interest rates. 30-year fixed mortgage rates are down more than three-quarters of a point from one year ago. Lock in.... Mortgage rates were mostly unchanged over the past week. According to Freddie Mac, the national average 30-year fixed mortgage this week was 6.16%, up one basis point. A year ago, it averaged 6.93%. … [+5070 chars]
